entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
